text_content.paragraph: In this module you learned about the functionality associated with the Wells/Sites tab.
You should now be able to:

bullets.bullet: Save, rename, delete and rerun a saved search, and
Customize search results by sorting them by columns, and rearranging columns

text_content.paragraph: In the next module you will learn about the functionality associated with conducting different types of Contracts searches.

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.
